pages.text: $(li)The Atlas can storage Maps that automatically updates the displayed map as you explore.$(br)$(li)To use it, just right click while you are holding the Atlas in your hand and insert your maps inside there

$(li)Once place, you can just walk to the outskirts of the map, this will cause what another Empty Map is consumed and the map of the Atlas is enlarged.$(br)$(li)Using the buttons + and - you can Zoom in or Zoom out your map, this option will be useful when this one gets too big.$(br)$(li)You can recover your maps left clicking on the map GUI of the Atlas.
